admreg: Europe and Central Asia,Europe and Central Asia

abstracts.cdata!:
The principal objectives of the
            Emergency Housing Repair Project are to assist the
            government of Bosnia - Herzegovina to carry out urgent
            housing repairs to both publicly and privately owned housing
            and to contribute to the development of a framework to
            sustain the recovery and development of the housing sector
            through gradual introduction of cost recovery for repair
            works. To meet these objectives, the project incorporates:
            a) a pilot project funded from the Dutch Trust Fund targeted
            at both private and public housing; b) emergency public
            housing repair for the common elements of public housing;
            and c) institutional support technical assistance and
            incremental operating support for the Project Implementation
            Unit and project municipalities' Housing Maintenance
            and Managing Enterprise design, management and supervision costs.
